articles.description: The Friedkin Group completes its majority takeover of Everton, ending the turbulent tenure of Farhad Moshiri.
articles.title: Everton takeover: Friedkin Group completes deal to end Farhad Moshiri tenure

articles.description: All the reaction to the quarter-finals of the EFL Cup as Arsenal, Liverpool, Newcastle all progress, plus build-up to Spurs v Man Utd.
articles.title: Arsenal, Newcastle & Liverpool reach EFL Cup quarter-finals - reaction

articles.description: BBC Sport columnist Nedum Onuoha explains why Manchester United forward Marcus Rashford has always been judged differently to other players.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Why Man Utd star is 'lightning rod for criticism'

articles.description: New Zealander Liam Lawson will race for Red Bull alongside Max Verstappen following the team's decision to ditch Sergio Perez.
articles.title: Liam Lawson to replace Sergio Perez at Red Bull in 2025

articles.description: As Mikel Arteta approaches his fifth anniversary as Arsenal manager, BBC Sport take a closer look at his time in charge.
articles.title: Arsenal 3-2 Crystal Palace: Mikel Arteta has rebuilt club in five years but needs to take final step

articles.description: BBC Sport consider what England have learned from their tour of South Africa with the Women's Ashes coming up in January.
articles.title: Women's Ashes: What have England learned from their tour of South Africa?

articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper will miss the first event of the 2025 season with a hip injury but is "very positive" about competing at the Australian Open.
articles.title: Australian Open: Injured Jack Draper hopes to be fit for Melbourne

articles.description: Sandro Tonali scores twice as Newcastle move into the semi-finals of the EFL Cup with a comfortable victory over Brentford at St James' Park.
articles.title: Newcastle United 3-1 Brentford: Newcastle cruise into Carabao Cup semis

articles.description: Ferrari team principal Frederic Vasseur says he is "not worried" about Lewis Hamilton's struggles in his final season with Mercedes.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton: Ferrari 'not worried' by new driver's recent form for Mercedes

articles.description: Christian Kist hits a nine-darter but loses his PDC Championship first-round match against Madars Razma.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship 2025: Christian Kist hits nine-darter but beaten
